question: What new designation did Bath receive in 2021 related to UNESCO?
true_answer: Included in the "Great Spa Towns of Europe"
asked_question_translated: ¿Qué nueva designación recibió Bath en 2021 en relación con la UNESCO?
answer: En 2021, Bath fue designada como una de las "Great Spa Towns of Europe" por la UNESCO.
answer_translated_eng: In 2021, Bath was designated as one of the "Great Spa Towns of Europe" by UNESCO.
